yeah yeah make them think that and dont forget my favorite slogan "if you build it they will come".
   
   I didnt start this group or build any contraptions. LOL
   
  Been alot of nastiness in here and it isnt any one person its several. Some of it stems from hostility on other forums, some of it starts right here or offline. Either way they all need to get a grip. We have the ban buttons for a reason I wont be the one questioning why they get used. 
   
  Misty

Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
            On second thought--Misty owns the group--she can run it any way she wants, allow who she want to stay, ban who she wants--not my problem!
 
 Frank-S
